page.title: 14HOW LOCALS SEE PETERCULTER.
page.content: {TRANSPORT} Most people thought that the public transport was quite good and that the buses were nearly always on time,and the fares cheap.The people interviewed said they used the bus service regularly. {AMENITIES Local people seemed to enjoy living in Peterculter,but they think a greater variety of shops is needed. There are two churches in the area and the people we asked said they were needed for different reasons.There is a library and also a community centre. {CHILDREN The children we spoke to liked the area but thought there should be more activities for them.They all liked the school and the teachers because they said they didn't get much work! CONT.
